definition: supernatural being (such as a demon, monster, ghost, spirit, gremlin etc)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.chinese: 他的風格是古靈精怪的。

sentences.english: We are happy to introduce the whimsical "Mod Molly" Neo Blythe!
sentences.chinese: 我們很高興向大家介紹古靈精怪的魔力小布。

sentences.english: The Gremlins descend from the sky with parachutes.
sentences.chinese: 從天空下了個精怪與降落傘。

sentences.english: She had a wicked sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 她有種古靈精怪的幽默感。

sentences.english: The door was sticking out of the back of a small head, ancient spirit demon watching Liu Qing.
sentences.chinese: 從門得後面探出來一個小腦袋，古靈精怪地望着劉清。

sentences.english: Jing-guai belief is the important content of Chinese folk culture.
sentences.chinese: 精怪信仰是中國民間基層文化的重要內容。

sentences.english: Little emerald green ancient clever choice is odd, constant with yuan abundant monkey business, let king mother headache unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 小翠古靈精怪，常與元豐胡鬧，讓王母頭疼不已。

sentences.english: JACK : Be careful what you say to him. He's smart and curious.
sentences.chinese: 跟他說什麼都要小心一點，他很聰明也很古靈精怪。
